planting_instructions.seed: Buy tomato seed or take from your kitchen. Wash them thoroughly and dry.
planting_instructions.planting: Use loamy soil, dig holes with a khurpi, and plant seeds.
planting_instructions.watering: Water twice a day, 200 ml each time.
planting_instructions.care: Keep in indirect sunlight. Use organic pesticides.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick tomatoes when they turn red.

planting_instructions.seed: Buy carrot seeds. Ensure soil is well-drained.
planting_instructions.planting: Plant seeds 1/4 inch deep and cover with loose soil.
planting_instructions.care: Weed regularly to avoid competition for nutrients.
planting_instructions.harvest: Harvest when roots are about 6 inches long.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant apple saplings, water well after planting.
planting_instructions.planting: Plant in well-drained clay soil. Ensure the site gets full sun.
planting_instructions.care: Prune regularly for better airflow and sunlight penetration.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick apples when they are firm and have rich color.

planting_instructions.seed: Buy spinach seeds. Sow them 1 inch apart.
planting_instructions.planting: Use loamy, well-drained soil. Water regularly.
planting_instructions.care: Provide partial shade for cooler climates.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant cabbage seeds in the spring.
planting_instructions.planting: Choose a sunny spot and use well-drained soil.
planting_instructions.harvest: Harvest when the heads are firm.

planting_instructions.seed: Buy lettuce seeds and plant in rows.
planting_instructions.planting: Ensure soil is sandy and well-drained.
planting_instructions.watering: Water regularly to keep soil moist.
planting_instructions.care: Thin out plants as they grow to allow space for proper development.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick leaves when they are young and tender.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant banana suckers from a mature banana plant.
planting_instructions.planting: Use well-drained loamy soil and space out plants.
planting_instructions.care: Provide support to growing plants and protect from strong winds.
planting_instructions.harvest: Harvest bananas when they turn yellow.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant strawberry runners in the spring.
planting_instructions.planting: Use acidic loamy soil and space plants 12-18 inches apart.
planting_instructions.watering: Water evenly but not too much to avoid root rot.
planting_instructions.care: Mulch around the plants to retain moisture and control weeds.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick strawberries when they are fully red.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant orange saplings and water well.
planting_instructions.planting: Use clay soil with good drainage and ensure full sun exposure.
planting_instructions.watering: Water regularly, especially during dry periods.
planting_instructions.care: Prune regularly to remove dead wood and promote healthy growth.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick oranges when they are fully ripe and slightly soft.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant pea seeds directly in the ground.
planting_instructions.planting: Use loamy soil with good drainage and full sunlight.
planting_instructions.watering: Water regularly but avoid soggy soil.
planting_instructions.care: Provide support for climbing pea vines.
planting_instructions.harvest: Harvest peas when they are firm and full.

planting_instructions.seed: Buy chili seeds and plant in well-drained soil.
planting_instructions.planting: Plant in a sunny location with loamy soil.
planting_instructions.watering: Water regularly but ensure proper drainage.
planting_instructions.care: Prune plants to encourage growth and remove dead leaves.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick chilies when they are red and fully mature.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant basil seeds in well-drained soil.
planting_instructions.planting: Ensure full sun exposure and space plants apart.
planting_instructions.watering: Water when the soil feels dry to the touch.
planting_instructions.care: Prune regularly to encourage bushy growth.
planting_instructions.harvest: Harvest leaves once the plant reaches 6 inches tall.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant pumpkin seeds directly in the soil.
planting_instructions.planting: Use sandy soil with ample space for vine growth.
planting_instructions.care: Provide support for growing pumpkins and mulch the soil.
planting_instructions.harvest: Harvest pumpkins when they turn orange and are firm.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant bell pepper seeds in starter pots before transferring to the ground.
planting_instructions.planting: Use loamy, well-drained soil and ensure full sun exposure.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick peppers when they are fully mature and colorful.

planting_instructions.seed: Buy rose bushes or cuttings and plant in fertile soil.
planting_instructions.planting: Plant in a sunny location with well-drained loamy soil.
planting_instructions.care: Prune dead stems and provide support to growing roses.
planting_instructions.harvest: Cut roses when they are in full bloom.

planting_instructions.seed: Plant tulip bulbs in well-drained soil during the fall.
planting_instructions.planting: Ensure soil is loose and not waterlogged.
planting_instructions.watering: Water after planting and during dry periods.
planting_instructions.care: Remove dead flowers to encourage new blooms.

planting_instructions.seed: Buy sunflower seeds and plant them directly in the soil.
planting_instructions.planting: Use sunny locations with loose, well-drained soil.
planting_instructions.care: Remove any weeds around the plant.
planting_instructions.harvest: Pick sunflowers when the seeds are ripe.
